mapper.insert: INSERT INTO space_tb (space_name, description, capacity, price, biz_start_time, biz_end_time, space_location, space_phone_Number, sector, is_inside, created_at, user_id, sport_id) VALUES (#{spaceName}, #{description}, #{capacity}, #{price}, #{bizStartTime}, #{bizEndTime}, #{spaceLocation}, #{spacePhoneNumber}, #{sector}, #{isInside}, NOW(), #{userId}, #{sportId});
mapper.update: update space_tb set space_name = #{spaceName}, description = #{description}, capacity = #{capacity}, price = #{price}, biz_start_time = #{bizStartTime}, biz_end_time = #{bizEndTime}, space_location = #{spaceLocation}, space_phone_Number = #{spacePhoneNumber}, sector = #{sector}, is_inside = #{isInside}, user_id = #{userId}, sport_id = #{sportId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM space_tb AS s JOIN reservation_tb AS r ON s.id = r.space_id JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN reservation_time_tb AS rt ON r.reservation_time_id = rt.id WHERE s.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY r.reservation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SPACE_TB as s LEFT JOIN USER_TB as u ON u.id = s.user_id LEFT JOIN SPACE_PIC_TB as sp ON sp.space_id = s.id where u.id = #{user_id}
select * from space_tb as space join space_pic_tb as pic on space.id= pic.space_id where space.id = #{id}
select * from space_tb space left join sport_tb sport on space.sport_id = sport.id left join space_pic_tb pic on space.id = pic.space_id order by space.id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
